articles.author: Catherine Belton
articles.title: As West goes after Russia’s oil fleet, Moscow fears for its war funding - The Washington Post
articles.description: New European measures to crack down on Russia’s shadow fleet could severely hurt its economy at a time when it is looking increasingly vulnerable.
articles.content: Europe is tightening the net on Russian oil being shipped through its waters, squeezing Moscows ability to fund its war even as officials and business executives in Russia fear the window is narrowin… [+55 chars]
